    • Constructor Detail

      • Track

        public Track(java.io.File file)
        Instantiates a new track. Sets the length, the album name, the title, the artist, the number of frames and the frame rate. Retrieves the lyrics and the album cover.
        Parameters:
        file - the file of the mp3
